Package com.baasbox.android

Class Summary
BAASBox BAASBox is the main class that can be used to access all the functionalities the SDK offers.
BAASBoxConfig This class contains all the options to configure a new BAASBox instance.
BAASBoxResult<T> This class wraps all the results of the BAASBox SDK.
BuildConfig  
R  
R.attr  
R.drawable  
R.string  
R.style  
 

Enum Summary
BAASBoxConfig.AuthType The supported authentication types.
 

Exception Summary
BAASBoxApiException This class extends BAASBoxException.
BAASBoxClientException A subclass of BAASBoxApiException indicating an error due a wrong request.
BAASBoxConnectionException This is a subclass of BAASBoxException indicating a problem of the connection itself, not the client, nor the server.
BAASBoxException This is the root of all the exceptions thrown by BAASBox SDK.
BAASBoxInvalidSessionException This is a particular subclass of BAASBoxApiException indicating an invalid state of the user session.
BAASBoxServerException A subclass of BAASBoxApiException indicating an error due a problem within the server.
